name: ZegnaRun 1.0
description:
ZegnaRun features fast pace, Infinite Runner style game play, with a unique level system that uses a single number to manage all aspects of your characters. Run, jump, and shoot your way to victory, as you fight dangerous foes!

Players will travel through new locations as Nomad, obtaining a variety of powerful Bullet Skills to combat the psychological distortions that plague the island residents of Zalgran'deleven. Face off against old characters and new, while obtaining party members (each with their own set of techniques). This game features a remastered version of the ZegnaRun Version 0.5 soundtrack that delivers a new way to listen.

Primary Application Features
----------------------------------------------
* 6 playable characters.
* 36 unique Bullet Skills.
* 6 fully interactive playing Fields.
* 36 progressive Story Events.
